    })
CREATE (e0:Campaign {name: "CloudSync Pro", duration: "March 1 - May 31, 2025", budget: "250000", target_users: "10000", campaign_manager: "Lisa Martinez", objectives: "Increase trial sign-ups and conversions for CloudSync Pro"})
CREATE (doc)-[:MENTIONS]->(e0)

fulltextMetadata.summary: This document outlines the Q1 2025 launch campaign for CloudSync Pro, targeting 10,000 new users with a $250,000 budget. The campaign will run from March to May 2025, focusing on IT managers in North America and Europe through digital ads, content marketing, email campaigns, and events. Key goals include achieving 5,000 trial signups and converting 500 paying customers while keeping customer acquisition costs below $500.
